titleStmt.title: Syons calamitye or Englands miserye hieroglyphically delineated.
titleStmt.author: Jackman, A.

notesStmt.note: An engraved plate with descriptive verses.
Verse - "Alas poore England! how art thou distrest".
Thomason copy cropped at foot; imprint from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
